original_text: God has been kind to us. He has given to each of us different gifts so that we can serve him. God helps some people to speak his messages clearly. Those people should trust God to tell them what to say.
korean_text: 우리에게 주신 은혜대로 받은 은사가 각각 다르니 혹 예언이면 믿음의 분수대로,

sentences.original_text: God has been kind to us.
He has given to each of us different gifts
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리 각자에게 다른 선물을 주셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: so that we can serve him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 우리가 그를 섬길 수 있도록 하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: to tell them what to say.
sentences.korean_translation: 무엇을 말해야 할지 알려주시도록 믿어야 합니다.
